transcript:
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir Rahul bol raha India Mart se.
Executive: Ji sir boliye kya kya hai.
Customer: Mai bol raha sir wo apna hua complaint.
Executive: Ji sir mujhe dusre fir customer ne India Mart ke bando ne call kiya.
Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir abhi hamari zoom meeting chal rahi thi na sir lagbhag 1 baje.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Fir usme se sir usme bahut char panch bande the to unhone fir bola Jio ka network kharab hai.
Customer: Haan haan wo to mai tha wo to sun gaya tha mai mai bhi tha sath me aapke kai log the na to unhone bolna tha aapse ki complaint karne ke liye Jio me mail karne ke liye.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Achcha ek kam karta hu mai na aapko na Jio ka mail id de de raha hu theek hai sir aur kya kya likhna hai wo mai likh ke aapko bhijwa de raha hu theek hai sir matlab bhej de raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Baki aap Jio ko aap na bhej dijiyega theek hai sir aur waha se ticket ticket number aayega aapko ticket number mujhe provide kar dijiyega theek hai na.
Executive: Theek hai sir mai bhejta hu. Aur sir ji aur iske liye na jo tha maine matlab hamari team aapko connect ki kiya ya nahi ki to ek feedback ka mail bhi jayega sir to aap please panch star kar dijiyega hai na.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Aur baki aur bhi koi dikkat sir?
Executive: Nahi sir baki to dikkat nahi hai bas thoda sa lead achche dijiye baki koi masla nahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Ji ji sir ne bola tha hum log phone pe the to unhone bola tha ki thoda sa abhi aap Airtel wale sim se use kar lijiye India Mart baki hum log usko theek karate hai na sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Complaint regarding Jio network issue.

- Wants good quality buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive provided Jio's mail ID.

- Executive will send the mail content.

- Asked to provide ticket number after mailing.

- Asked to give 5-star rating for feedback mail.

- Suggested using Airtel sim for IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- jio network, complaint, buyleads, feedback
